experiment.name: Transcription profiling of Arabidopsis 3 week old plant leaves Overexpressing of TELOMERASE ACTIVATOR 1 (TAC1) vs controls

description.text: The goal of this investigation was to identify putative targets of the TELOMERASE ACTIVATOR 1 transcription factor. Experiment Overall Design: Total RNA was isolated from leaves of 3 week old plants.  We used three biological replicates of wild type (Columbia) and the tac1-1D activation tagged line (Ren et al., 2004. Plant Cell 16; 2910-2922).

bibliography.authors: Shuxin Ren, Kranthi K Mandadi, Amy L Boedeker, Keerti S Rathore, Thomas D McKnight
bibliography.title: Regulation of telomerase in Arabidopsis by BT2, an apparent target of TELOMERASE ACTIVATOR1.
